name: Battleships vs Submarines - Naval Battle
description:
Enemy is attacking. You are the only force we have in this region. Hold you position and destroy as many enemies as possible. Good luck, commander.

Highlights:
•Challenging sea battle
•Numerous enemy submarines to destroy
•Powerful weapon to use
•Tilt iPhone to control
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center and OpenFeint Support
•It’s FREE!!!
